about_the_game:
Game Features

It tells the story of a boy who ran away from home, entered a strange village in the fog, met a girl in the village, and gradually uncovered the mystery of the village-a mysterious girl with a dual personality who only appears at night-a lost person who got lost and entered the village like himself-10+ exquisite CGs (excluding splitting)-updramatic plot, two different endings to choose from-this game contains some uncomfortable plots, please read the following precautions before deciding whether to buy it-the choice of ending will affect the integrity of the story
Character introduction
The girl in the fortune-telling shop in the village has a strong obsession with fortune-telling. She is very enthusiastic about the customers who come to fortune-tell, but she is very shy and shy towards people other than her. She will change into another personality at night. She only discovered her problem after meeting the protagonist.

Lively and cheerful, outgoing and sociable. A lost person who got lost and arrived in the village before herself. She was secretly observing the river of oblivion when they first met. It is easy to get along with her, but it seems that there are some unknown secrets.

short_description: An adventure suspense, love simulation visual novel game. The player plays the role of a boy who runs away from home and enters a strange village in the fog. Then he meets the girl in the village and gradually uncovers the mystery of the village. Your final choice determines the ending of the two.
